# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate object to receive update events.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any CLLocationManagerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

In iOS, this property is declared as `nonatomic`. In macOS, it is declared as `atomic`.

## Receiving data from location services

- **CLLocationManagerDelegate**: The methods you use to receive events from an associated location-manager object.

items.description: The methods you use to receive events from an associated location-manager object.
